originalText.text: My wife and I live down the street and had been to Daniela's occasionally for our home garden needs (lovely pot selection!) but they really came through for us recently on our wedding. Eugene was an absolute darling who was very patient with us as we stressed over our selections and he delivered on his assurances. The arrangements, bouquet, and boutonnieres were beautiful and we received endless compliments on them from our guests. Also the deliveries were prompt and professional, and they gave us quite a fair price. Great flowers from great neighbors :)

originalText.text: The professionalism, artistry in floral design, and the personalized attention to detail is GREATLY appreciated! The initiative taken to call the client to confirm any adjustments to existing orders testifies that this florist shop really optimizes customer service. In addition, the quality and freshness of the flowers is awesome! If you take care of them well, arrangements can last close to 2 to 3 weeks! Folks, there's a reason why florists provide the nutrient packets! I also ordered 15 boutonnieres in the last minute for next day event and florist graciously accommodated request. Order was expedited and ready by 9am! I have never been disappointed. If anything, arrangements have become conversation starters! I have made many people jealous of my mom at her job when I would send her beautiful arrangements through the services of this florist shop. The staff is ALWAYS friendly, ready and willing to provide their services if given the opportunity. Thank you always for the beautiful awesome floral arrangement coordinated for my mom's Memorial service.

originalText.text: Attention shop owner, I was in your shop on Wednesday as I was visiting from North Carolina, this shop doesn't compare to our lil mom and pop shops and your designs cool, my only issue is that I purchased some flowers and they were put together nicely by your dude there, cool job, but the only again issue that left me wondering is that my total was 60.00 and the gal who charged me gave some receipt that read 6.00 for the cash I gave. This doesnt appear to be positive, I should have contacted sooner but your receipt didnt have a number and Im now back home and thought I share this with you since I called asking for the owner but they told me HE was not available. Other than that funny business your shop is nice and your flowers reasonable. Im not sure If  I still have the receipt since it was crumbled up before she gave it to me when I asked for it. I would go back either way.

originalText.text: Very disappointing and unprofessional. I placed an order on the flower shop's website for birthday flowers to be delivered the following day. The order went through and I received an email confirmation for it. It wasn't until 3 pm the next day (on the recipient's birthday), that I received an email from the company saying they don't deliver to her delivery address and have cancelled the order. I called them and asked why the order was even abled to be submitted if they don't deliver there, and all I was told was "I don't know but you weren't charged for it." That's great but it doesn't help my friend who now won't be receiving flowers, balloons, or a card on her birthday. And if the order was going to be cancelled, why did the company not notify me first thing in the morning instead of waiting until 3 pm. Awful experience.

originalText.text: My niece sent me a flower arrangement for my birthday from out of state. The arrangement came from Uptown Daniella’s Flower Shop. They are beautiful. Fresh, very full and lovely color combination. Couldn’t be happier!
